required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study of KHK2375 in Subjects With Advanced or Recurrent Breast Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: Phase 1 Study of KHK2375 in Subjects With Advanced or Recurrent Breast Cancer

brief_summary.textblock: The primary objective of the open-label, dose-escalation study is to investigate the safety of single-dose monotherapy and repeated-dose of KHK2375 combined with exemestane in female subjects with advanced or recurrent breast cancer. The secondary objective is to investigate the pharmacokinetics and efficacy.

primary_outcome.measure: Number and percentage of subjects with treatment-emergent adverse events including dose-limiting toxicities and serious adverse events
primary_outcome.time_frame: Assessed up to 28 days after study discontinuation

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose, Cycle 0 Days 1, 2, 4, 6, Cycle 1 Days 1, 2, 4, 6, 8, 15, 22 and Cycle 2 Day 1

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics of KHK2375 [Area under the curve (AUC)]
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose, Cycle 0 Days 1, 2, 4, 6, Cycle 1 Days 1, 2, 4, 6, 8, 15, 22 and Cycle 2 Day 1
Pre-dose, Cycle 0 Days 1, 2, 4, 6, Cycle 1 Days 1, 2, 4, 6, 8, 15, 22 and Cycle 2 Day 1

intervention.description: KHK2375 will be orally administered once weekly. KHK2375 in combination with exemestane will be repeatedly administered in a 28-day cycle. Exemestane will be orally adminitered once daily.
KHK2375 will be orally administered once weekly. KHK2375 in combination with exemestane will be repeatedly administered in a 28-day cycle. Exemestane will be orally adminitered once daily.
